script.name: Parameter definition
script.comments: Example simple script that shows how to define and use a user parameter in scripts
script.content:
#@MetaDataStart #@DetailDescriptionStart ############################################################################## # Purpose : Example script to showcase how to declare a parameter and use it ############################################################################## #@DetailDescriptionEnd # simple parameter with a description # @VariableFieldLabel (description = "Enter foo") set var foo bar
# Read only parameter. user cannot change value when running script # @VariableFieldLabel (description = "Read only", readonly = yes) set var foo1 bar1
# Parameter that can take values only from the given list of valid values # @VariableFieldLabel (description = "Parameter of numeric type", validValues = [yes, no]) set var foo2 bar2
# Parameter whose value user can change per device. Multi-line parameter declaration # @VariableFieldLabel (description = "Parameter of numeric type", # scope = device) set var foo3 bar3
#@MetaDataEnd # print value of parameters Echo $foo Echo $foo1 Echo $foo2 Echo $foo3
script.creator: admin
